pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Methods in the Analysis of Zero-Inflated Poisson Model // Implementation of zero-inflated Poisson models under Bayesian framework using data augmentation as discussed in Chapter 5 of Zhang (2020) https://hdl.handle.net/10012/16378. This package is constructed in accommodating four different scenarios: the general scenario, the scenario with measurement error in responses, the external validation scenario, and the internal validation scenario.
